title: Creates or expands facial recognition database (Art. 5(1)(e))

nodes.label: Creates or expands a facial recognition database

question.prompt: Does the system create or expand a facial recognition database?
question.help: A facial recognition database stores biometric templates or facial images for recognition/matching. Expansion includes enlarging an existing database with new entries or images.

items.label: Recital (43)
items.text: Untargeted scraping to create or expand facial recognition databases adds to the feeling of mass surveillance and can grossly violate fundamental rights, including privacy.
